text: Sweet, Soft N' Lazy - The Very Best Of is the first official best-of album by French-Belgian singer Viktor Lazlo. This compilation album contained songs from her previous albums She (1985), Viktor Lazlo (1987), Hot & Soul (1989) and My Delicious Poisons (1991), as well her duet hit single Das erste Mal tat's noch weh with Stefan Waggershausen, which was a big hit in Germany, Austria and Switzerland. The only new song on this album was The Dream Is In Our Hands, which was also released as a single. ==Track listing== ==References== Category:1993 albums Category:Viktor Lazlo albums
